metadata.creator: Javi Hernández Hernández (disainmasta)
metadata.description:
Have you ever been frustrated by a computer error? Now you can take revenge on all the dirty tricks your computer does! You can destroy a PC without any pain or cost.

With the worldwide famous stress-relieving flash game "Métele al Ordenata" (Bash the Computer) you are able to relax without regretting.
metadata.subject: Shockwave
Flash
Destroy the Computer
Métele al Ordenata
metadata.title: Métele al Ordenata (Destroy the Computer)
